title: ASUS Vivobook 16 16" Laptop - Indie Black (Intel Core i5-13420H/16GB RAM/512GB SSD/Windows 11)
description: Experience seamless everyday computing with the ASUS Vivobook 16 laptop. Powered by the Intel Core i5-13420H processor and 16GB DDR4 RAM, it ensures smooth multitasking. The 16-inch WUXGA (1920 x 1200) display with NanoEdge ultra-thin bezels offers immersive visuals, while its MIL-STD 810H military-grade certification guarantees exceptional reliability.
features: ASUS Vivobook 16 (X1605) laptop
Adapter
Warranty card
Manual
Intel Core i5-13420H processor and 16GB DDR4 RAM deliver fast, responsive performance for smooth multitasking and demanding applications
512GB solid-state drive offers fast data access, quick boot times, and ample storage for your files and applications
16-inch screen with WUXGA (1920 x 1200) resolution, NanoEdge ultra-thin bezels, and a 16:10 aspect ratio provides a spacious, immersive viewing experience
Certified by TUV Rheinland for low blue light, ensuring eye protection during extended use

Wi-Fi 6E(802.11ax) (Dual band) 2 x 2, and Bluetooth 5.3 wireless card (Bluetooth version may change with OS version) provide reliable, high-speed wireless connectivity and improved Bluetooth performance

One USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, one USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, one USB 2.0 Type-A, a HDMI 1.4, and a combo audio jack offer more options for connecting external devices (USB transfer speed may vary. Learn more at the ASUS website)
180-degree hinge, ASUS ErgoSense chiclet keyboard with a numeric keypad, optimal click ratio, and a larger multi-finger touchpad significantly enhance your work efficiency

Fingerprint sensor and an HD camera with a privacy shutter improve security
ASUS Antimicrobial Guard Plus (disclaimer: learn more at the ASUS website) protects frequently touched surfaces for improved hygiene
Weighing just 1.88kg (4.14lb.) and measuring only 1.99cm (0.78") in thickness, it offers exceptional mobility and a seamless finish for a smooth touch experience
Preloaded with Windows 11 Home operating system that features easy user interface
summary: Experience seamless computing with the ASUS Vivobook 16 laptop, featuring an Intel Core i5-13420H processor and 16GB DDR4 RAM for fast multitasking. Enjoy immersive visuals on the 16-inch WUXGA display with NanoEdge bezels, while the MIL-STD 810H certification ensures exceptional reliability. Stay connected with Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3, and enhance work efficiency with features like ASUS AI noise cancellation and ErgoSense chiclet keyboard.
highlights: Intel Core i5 processor and 16GB RAM for fast, responsive multitasking
512GB SSD for quick data access and ample storage
16-inch WUXGA display with NanoEdge bezels for immersive visuals
TUV Rheinland certified for low blue light, ensuring eye protection

title: Microsoft Surface Pro (LCD) Copilot+ PC 12" 512GB Tablet with Snapdragon X Plus/16GB RAM (2025) - Violet - Device Only
description: Stay productive and creative, on the go, with this ultra-thin Microsoft Surface Pro 12" tablet. Light and flexible, you can use it as a tablet or turn it into a laptop for comfortable typing1. Featuring an immersive PixelSense Flow LCD touchscreen and Qualcomm Snapdragon X Plus processor, this machine helps you do more in less time. Plus, possibilities are endless with advanced AI capabilities.
features: Device
USB-C Charging Cable
QSG
Safety And Warranty Documents (No Charger Included)

Enjoy exclusive Copilot+ PC experiences for productivity and efficiency boosts (on some devices, Copilot+ PC experiences require free updates available starting later this year and continuing into 2025)
Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon X Plus (eight core) processor, delivering powerful performance and AI accelerated power
Features turbocharged Qualcomm Hexagon NPU that delivers up to 45 TOPs designed to accelerate AI experiences
12-inch tablet with PixelSense Flow LCD touchscreen display offers stunning, vibrant visuals and image quality

Stay in the flow—whether you're streaming shows, YouTube, movies, or even video calls, enjoy up to 16 hours of battery (battery life varies significantly based on usage, network and feature configuration, signal strength, settings and other factors)
Charge on-the-go, transfer data fast, or create the ultimate desktop set up with two USB-C 3.2 ports (USB4 and USB-C are registered trademarks of USB Implementers Forum)
Store and charge Surface Slim Pen1 directly in the new pen storage area on the back of Surface Pro
Designed to be a laptop or a tablet, the built-in 165-degree fluid kickstand offers flexibility at any angle
Pair with a Surface Pro 12-inch keyboard1 to turn it into a full thin and light Windows laptop with a comfortable typing and touchpad experience
Instantly access your device using facial recognition with Windows Hello; fast, personal, secure and no password needed
Power supply is now sold separately to support Microsoft's sustainability promise
summary: Introducing the ultra-thin Microsoft Surface Pro 12" tablet, powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon X Plus processor for powerful performance and AI acceleration. Enjoy up to 16 hours of battery life and stunning visuals on the PixelSense Flow LCD touchscreen display. With features like USB-C ports, pen storage, and Windows Hello facial recognition, this versatile device seamlessly transitions from tablet to laptop for maximum productivity on the go.
tagline: Unleash limitless creativity with Surface Pro's AI-powered versatility.
highlights: Transform between tablet and laptop for seamless productivity
Stunning 12" PixelSense Flow LCD touchscreen display
Qualcomm Snapdragon X Plus processor for powerful performance
Up to 16 hours of battery life for uninterrupted work and entertainment
Pair with Surface Pro accessories for a complete user experience

title: Apple MacBook Air 13.6" w/ Touch ID (2025) - Midnight (Apple M4 / 16GB RAM / 256GB SSD) - English
description: The 13-inch MacBook Air with the M4 chip lets you fly through work and play. With Apple Intelligence,1 a brilliant Liquid Retina display, up to 18 hours of battery life,2 and a strikingly thin and light design, it’s built to last and can take on just about anything, anywhere.
features: 13" MacBook Air
30W USB‑C Power Adapter
USB‑C to MagSafe 3 Cable (2 m)
Supercharged by M4—the Apple M4 chip brings even more speed and fluidity to everything you do, like working across multiple apps, editing videos or playing graphically demanding games

Built for Apple Intelligence—Apple Intelligence is the personal intelligence system that helps you write, express yourself and get things done effortlessly. With groundbreaking privacy protections, it gives you peace of mind that no one else can access your data—not even Apple1
Up to 18 hours of battery life—MacBook Air delivers the same amazing performance whether it’s running on battery or plugged in2
Superlight and less than half an inch thin, MacBook Air fits easily into your bag—and your on-the-go lifestyle
The 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display supports one billion colours.3 Photos and videos pop with rich contrast and sharp detail, and text appears supercrisp
Everything looks and sounds amazing with a 12MP Center Stage camera, three mics and four speakers with Spatial Audio
MacBook Air features two Thunderbolt 4 ports, a MagSafe charging port, a headphone jack, Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3. And it supports up to two external displays
All your favourites run lightning fast in macOS, including Microsoft 365, Adobe Creative Cloud and Google Workspace4

Mac works like magic with your other Apple devices. View and control what’s on your iPhone from your Mac with iPhone Mirroring5. Copy something on iPhone and paste it on Mac. Send texts with Messages or use your Mac to make and answer FaceTime calls6
summary: Experience unparalleled speed and efficiency with the 13-inch MacBook Air, powered by the cutting-edge M4 chip. Boasting up to 18 hours of battery life and a stunning Liquid Retina display, this superlight and ultra-thin device is perfect for work and play on the go. With innovative features like Apple Intelligence and seamless integration with other Apple devices, the MacBook Air is a versatile powerhouse for all your productivity needs.
tagline: Unleash Limitless Power with MacBook Air M4
highlights: Supercharged by M4 chip for lightning-fast performance
Built for Apple Intelligence with enhanced privacy protection
Up to 18 hours of battery life for all-day productivity
Ultra-thin and lightweight design for portability
Stunning Liquid Retina display for vivid visuals and crisp text
